common_errors.pattern: \[vue-i18n\] Not found '.*' key in '.*' locale messages
causes: Key not defined in locale JSON/object

common_errors.pattern: \[vue-i18n\] Cannot translate the value of keypath
common_errors.meaning: Translation with invalid or undefined value
solutions: Ensure all interpolation values are defined: $t('msg', { name: userName })
Use computed property for reactive translations

common_errors.pattern: TypeError: this\.\$t is not a function
common_errors.meaning: Vue I18n not installed or configured
causes: createI18n not called or not used with app
Options API vs Composition API mismatch
Using $t in setup() instead of useI18n()
solutions: Composition API: const { t } = useI18n(); use t() not $t

common_errors.meaning: HTML content in translation without proper handling

common_errors.pattern: \[vue-i18n\] The datetime format '.*' is not defined
causes: Format name not in datetimeFormats config
solutions: Define format in createI18n: datetimeFormats: { en: { short: { year: 'numeric', month: 'short' } } }

common_errors.meaning: Using legacy mode with Vue 3 recommendation
causes: Using legacy: true in Vue 3 project
solutions: Set legacy: false for Composition API mode
Update code to use useI18n() in setup()
Follow migration guide for $t to t() changes

common_errors.meaning: Attempting to switch to non-existent locale
solutions: Pre-load locales: messages: { en: enMessages, de: deMessages }
Use setLocaleMessage before switching: i18n.global.setLocaleMessage('de', messages)
